subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Kicker Chris Blewitt missed a 26-yard field-goal attempt on the final play of regulation and Pittsburgh’s defense yielded two touchdowns in overtime as No. 24 Duke escaped with a 51-48 victory.
snippet: Kicker Chris Blewitt missed a 26-yard field-goal attempt on the final play of regulation and Pittsburgh’s defense yielded two touchdowns in overtime as No. 24 Duke escaped with a 51-48 victory.
